meta_title: Privacy Policy - Wordle Clash: Nation Domination | Wordle Clash Nation
meta_description: Privacy Policy - Learn how your data is protected and managed on Wordle Clash: Nation Domination.
meta_keywords: privacy, policy, wordle, clash, nation, domination, data collection
og_title: Privacy Policy - Wordle Clash: Nation Domination
og_description: Read the privacy policy of Wordle Clash: Nation Domination by Wordle Clash Nation.
twitter_title: Privacy Policy - Wordle Clash: Nation Domination
twitter_description: Read the privacy policy of Wordle Clash: Nation Domination by Wordle Clash Nation.
policy_intro_paragraph1: This Privacy Policy explains what personal data is collected when you use the Wordle Clash: Nation Domination mobile app (the "App") and the services provided through it (together with the App, the "Service"), how such personal data will be used, and shared.
policy_intro_paragraph2: BY USING THE SERVICE, YOU PROMISE US THAT (I) YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTAND AND AGREE TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY, AND (II) YOU ARE OVER 16 YEARS OF AGE (OR HAVE HAD YOUR PARENT OR GUARDIAN READ AND AGREE TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY FOR YOU). If you do not agree, or are unable to make this promise, you must not use the Service.
section1_description: The personal data provided to us will be processed by:
section2_description: When you use the Service, we may collect the following types of data:
section2_info_personal: Personal Information: Name, email address, and any other details you provide to us.
section2_info_usage: Usage Data: Information about how you use the App, including actions, frequency of use, and device information.
section2_info_cookies: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: To enhance user experience and track usage patterns, we may use cookies and similar technologies.
section3_description: We use the collected data for the following purposes:
section3_use_provide: To provide, operate, and maintain the Service
section3_use_improve: To improve, personalize, and expand the Service
section3_use_communicate: To communicate with you, including sending updates and promotional material (if you opt in)
section3_use_monitor: To monitor usage and prevent abuse of the Service
section4_description: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. However, we may share your data in the following cases:
section4_share_providers: With third-party service providers who assist in the operation of the Service
section4_share_legal: If required by law, or if we believe it is necessary to protect the rights, property, or safety of Wordle Clash Nation, our users, or others.
section5_right_correction: Request the correction or deletion of your data
section5_right_withdraw: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
footer_copyright: © 2024 Wordle Clash Nation. All Rights Reserved.
privacy_intro: Bienvenue sur Wordle Clash Nation Domination. Nous nous engageons à protéger votre vie privée et à garantir la sécurité de vos informations personnelles.
privacy_information_collection_content: Nous collectons uniquement les informations nécessaires pour améliorer votre expérience de jeu, telles que les scores, les classements et les préférences linguistiques. Nous ne collectons pas d'informations personnelles identifiables sans votre consentement explicite.
privacy_information_use_content: Les informations collectées sont utilisées pour personnaliser votre expérience, améliorer le jeu et assurer l'intégrité des classements. Nous ne partageons pas vos données avec des tiers, sauf si la loi l'exige.
privacy_data_security_content: Nous mettons en œuvre des mesures de sécurité standard pour protéger vos données contre tout accès non autorisé ou toute divulgation.
privacy_children_content: Wordle Clash Nation Domination n'est pas destiné aux enfants de moins de 13 ans. Nous ne collectons pas sciemment d'informations auprès d'enfants.
privacy_changes_content: Nous pouvons mettre à jour cette politique de confidentialité de temps à autre. Toute modification sera publiée sur cette page.
privacy_contact_content: Pour toute question concernant cette politique de confidentialité, veuillez nous contacter à support@wordleclash.playgamesnow.org.
